text: Jolyellus albomaculatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Jolyellus. It was described by Galileo and Martins in 2007.Biolib.cz - Jolyellus albomaculatus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 2007 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Jolyellus
